scenario.name: Basic UAC
scenario.send: REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:1003@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:1003@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 1 REGISTER Contact: <sip:1003@[local_ip]:[local_port];line=10d9fd07f9eb2d0> Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, OPTIONS, CANCEL, UPDATE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, INFO, MESSAGE Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: SIPP Expires: 600 Supported: path Content-Length: 0

REGISTER sip:[remote_ip]:[remote_port] SIP/2.0 Via: SIP/2.0/[transport] [local_ip]:[local_port];branch=[branch] From: <sip:1003@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]>;tag=[call_number] To: <sip:1003@[remote_ip]:[remote_port]> Call-ID: [call_id] CSeq: 2 REGISTER Contact: <sip:1003@[local_ip]:[local_port];line=10d9fd07f9eb2d0> [authentication username=1003 password=1234] Allow: INVITE, ACK, BYE, OPTIONS, CANCEL, UPDATE, SUBSCRIBE, NOTIFY, INFO, MESSAGE Max-Forwards: 70 User-Agent: SIPP Expires: 600 Supported: path Content-Length: 0
